title: U.S. stock futures fall after Saudi oil attacks
text:
U.S. stock futures fall after Saudi oil attacks

Stock Markets 53 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 00:20)

© Reuters. U.S. stock futures fall after Saudi oil attacks Sept 15 (Reuters) - U.S. stock futures fell 0.59% percent when trading resumed on Sunday, a day after attacks on Saudi oil facilities that risk disrupting global energy supplies. Saturday's attacks knocked out more than half of Saudi oil output, or more than 5% of global supply. 500 e-mini futures fell 0.59% on volume of 4,341 contracts.

U.S. stock futures fall after Saudi oil attacks
description: U.S. stock futures fall after Saudi oil attacks
